casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Plain Dealer Publishing Company v. Cuyahoga County Court of Common Pleas.

[Cite as State ex rel. Plain Dealer Publishing Co. v. Cuyahoga Cty. Court of Common Pleas (2000), 88 Ohio St.3d 1225.]

(No. 00-301 Submitted and decided February 11, 2000.) Baker & Hostettler, L.L.P., Kyle B. Fleming and Jeffrey T. Williams, for relator. Richard M. Knoth, Jayne L. Jakubaitis and Vivek K Haiti, for respondent. Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas, J., concurs in judgment. Douglas, J.,

concurring. I concur in the judgment to grant an alternative writ prohibition, but to me the issue is so clear that I would issue a peremptory writ. See, e.g., R.C. 2731.06, peremptory mandamus. See, also, Section 2(B)(1)(d), Article IV, Ohio Constitution.
